div.p: In Open Zelda, Each item on the screen is classed as an Object. From a sprite, circle or some text, they're all treated the same, allowing from easy reusing of existing code. For example, you could add the block entity to a Tree sprite, and it will act as a block you can push around.
div.h3: Entity Notes and How to Use them.

p.p: Player Entity, Can be found attach to "player" sprite on "p01.png" spritesheet. Just make sure you make it a global entity.

p.div: key - Determines if a key is need to open door. 1 for normal key, 2 for master key.
closed - Enable it door is close, otherwise it's open.
shut - A non-shut door will open if a player touches it.
section - For this door entity it can only connect section together.
target_map - List of map that are part of 'section' section.
target - List of entities that are part of 'target_map' map.
on-entity - Entity Name for when being step on.
on-function - Function to call for when being step on.
off-entity - Entity Name for when being step off.
off-function - Function to call for when being step off.
